headline: This old-school hobby is helping Hasbro defy economic headwinds
summary: Amid inflation and tariffs, this part of Hasbro is booming

headline: HAS Q2 Deep Dive: MAGIC Drives Growth Amid Tariffs and Consumer Product Shifts
summary: Toy and entertainment company Hasbro (NASDAQ:HAS) reported Q2 CY2025 results topping the market’s revenue expectations, but sales fell by 1.5% year on year to $980.8 million. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.30 per share was 68.6% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
